Topic.Title: Complete Sci-Fi Game: A Galaxy Consumed

Posts.EditableText:
Do you want to have your own private spaceship?

Do you want to be a human, or even an alien, traveling across the Milky Way?

Do you want to fight alongside your crewmates in turn-based combat against an apocalyptic menace against which, despite your advanced weaponry, you will almost surely perish?

After 2 years in development and multiple false-starts where I didn't know enough about Quest to pull off the game I'd envisioned, my science-fiction game "A Galaxy Consumed" is done and ready to be played. If you're interested please check it out, and certainly please leave feedback on it!

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/fyp6rpzkoearvgsfseeasw/a-galaxy-consumed
